Text: I hate RAR releases. I'll wait for the video version.

RARS are re not my favourite either, but they're easy enough to convert to AVI. And the great thing is that scenebalance has repeatedly uploaded this show days ahead of anyone else! 

So thank you very, very much, scenebalance - I'm downloading away now (can't wait to see this finale!!). And I really appreciate the speed and quality of your uploads.
